name: A Garden On The Sea
description:
A Garden On The Sea tells the journey of Elliot and Lori to find a new home. Dive, explore and plant to uncover a story of fear, growing up and gardening in the middle of the ocean.

A game made for #GreatSpringGameJam2021 in 3 weeks

(Recommended playing in fullscreen)

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Interact

J: Dash

Credits:

Music:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Sergey_Cheremisinov

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Katy_Kirby
